Sentencas: Atomistic free-energy minimization techniques were used to simulate three simultaneous volumetric shrinkage/expansion phenomena in calcium-doped lanthanum chromite solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) interconnect materials.
Titulo: Chemical and thermal expansion of calcium-doped lanthanum chromite

Sentencas: Four sets of interatomic potentials were developed and tested over the temperature range 0-1273 K.
Titulo: Chemical and thermal expansion of calcium-doped lanthanum chromite

Sentencas: The predicted unit-cell volumes, elastic properties, volumetric shrinkage due to A-site doping of the ABO, perovskite (La1-xCax)CrO3, defect-induced volumetric expansion due to reducing atmospheres, and thermal expansion were in reasonable agreement with experiment, though not all concurrently with a single set of potentials.
Titulo: Chemical and thermal expansion of calcium-doped lanthanum chromite

Sentencas: Potentials based either on simple oxides or on partial charge models appeared to give the best overall predictions.
Titulo: Chemical and thermal expansion of calcium-doped lanthanum chromite

Sentencas: Additional experimental data are needed to improve the potentials.
Titulo: Chemical and thermal expansion of calcium-doped lanthanum chromite
Chemical and thermal expansion of calcium-doped lanthanum chromite
